item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Has someone tired the Milkshake, The Right Stuff or a Super Potion ?
By the way, what can you mix with a Super Potion ?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
sadly, I cannot seem to get any Glowing Goo with which to attempt to mix it, so annoying trying to get powerpacks nowadays

EDIT: Nevermind, tried all those as well as a Double Double, nothing, nor filter wrappings, this is so annoying knowing it mixes as well as distills and not being able to find anything.
